column4: 'title': [u'\n                    Giovanni Organic Straight Fast Straightening Hair Elixir            ']
column16:
'desc': [u'

Giovanni Organic Straight Fast Straightening Hair Elixir (200 ml) Price: Rs.695

Do you love straight hair? Then here’s a great product to smoothen your locks and keep them looking straight for longer – The Giovanni Organic Straight Fast Straightening Hair Elixir. This Straightening Hair Elixir is suitable for use by both
column17:
men and women to give them irresistibly smooth and straight locks. The lightweight clear gel doesn’t weigh your hair down and adds an iridescent shine while repelling humidity thereby preventing frizz and flyaway. Tame those curls and waves and keep your hair looking tidy whether you’re at the office or in college with the Giovanni Organic Hair Elixir. You don’t have to worry if this Straightening Hair Elixir would suit your hair type as it can be used on all hair types.

The organic botanical extracts protect hair from heat styling and other adverse environmental conditions like humidity to keep your hair looking sleek and straight till your next wash. The handy tube can be carried along with you in your office bag for those quick touch-ups before that presentation or meeting. Tame your unruly locks and flaunt the ultimate sleek hair with the Giovanni Organic Fast Straightening Hair Elixir and let your hair be the talk of the town.
